alert.note: Alert for Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 04 at 6:00PM CDT until July 05 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri, including the following county, Wright. * WHEN...Until 730 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 558 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated that between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen over the advisory area. This amount of rainfall over a short period of time can lead to flooding. - This includes the following low water crossings... Dove Creek at Dove Creek Road, Whetstone Creek at Owens Road and Wolf Creek at Highway AB. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hartville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
